alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 12 at 2:47PM MST until March 13 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A RED FLAG warning has been issued from noon to 7 pm Sunday for low humidity values and gusty winds for fire weather zone 237...which includes Baca County... ...RED FLAG WARNING HAS BEEN ISSUED FROM NOON TO 7 PM MDT SUNDAY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 237... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning which is in effect from noon to 7 PM MDT Sunday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 237. * Winds...South 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 12 percent. * Temperatures...In the low 70s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands
